message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at that price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product based on its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $6,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $7,500. Can you meet me at that price?
